resources.name: MDL - Metrics Definition Library API
resources.description: API testing collection for Metrics Definition Library with support for file storage and PostgreSQL database operations

resources.name: Health
resources.description: Health check endpoints

resources.name: Metrics (File Storage)
resources.description: Metric CRUD operations using file storage

resources.name: Universal Import
resources.description: Universal import for all data types (metrics, domains, objectives)

resources.name: Policies
resources.description: OPA policy generation endpoints

resources.name: Statistics
resources.description: Metrics statistics and aggregations

resources.name: PostgreSQL - Metrics
resources.description: PostgreSQL metric operations

resources.name: PostgreSQL - Domains
resources.description: PostgreSQL business domain operations

resources.name: PostgreSQL - Objectives
resources.description: PostgreSQL objectives and key results operations

resources.name: Health Check
resources.description: Check if the API server is running and healthy

resources.name: Import Single Metric
resources.description: Import a single metric using universal import endpoint

resources.name: Import Batch Metrics
resources.description: Import multiple metrics in one request

resources.name: Import Single Domain
resources.description: Import a single domain (requires PostgreSQL)

resources.name: Import Mixed Data Types
resources.description: Import both metrics and domains in one request

resources.name: Get All Metrics
resources.description: Retrieve all metric definitions

resources.name: Get Metrics (Filtered)
resources.description: Retrieve metrics with filters: business_domain, tier, metric_type, tags

resources.name: Get Metric by ID
resources.description: Retrieve a specific metric definition by ID

resources.name: Create Metric
resources.description: Create a new metric definition

resources.name: Update Metric
resources.description: Update an existing metric definition

resources.name: Delete Metric
resources.description: Delete a metric definition by ID

resources.name: Get Metric Policy
resources.description: Generate OPA policy for a specific metric

resources.name: Get All Policies
resources.description: Generate OPA policies bundle for all metrics

resources.name: Get Statistics
resources.description: Get aggregated statistics about all metrics

resources.name: Test Database Connection
resources.description: Test PostgreSQL database connection

resources.name: Fetch Metrics from PostgreSQL
resources.description: Retrieve all metrics from PostgreSQL database

resources.name: Save Metric to PostgreSQL
resources.description: Create or update a metric in PostgreSQL database

resources.name: Delete Metric from PostgreSQL
resources.description: Delete a metric from PostgreSQL database

resources.name: Fetch Domains from PostgreSQL
resources.description: Retrieve all business domains from PostgreSQL

resources.name: Save Domain to PostgreSQL
resources.description: Create or update a business domain in PostgreSQL

resources.name: Delete Domain from PostgreSQL
resources.description: Delete a business domain from PostgreSQL

resources.name: Fetch Objectives from PostgreSQL
resources.description: Retrieve all objectives with key results from PostgreSQL

resources.name: Save Objective to PostgreSQL

body.text:
{
  "dbConfig": {
    "host": "{{ _.db_host }}",
    "port": {{ _.db_port }},
    "database": "{{ _.db_name }}",
    "user": "{{ _.db_user }}",
    "password": "{{ _.db_password }}"
  },
  "objective": {
    "objective_id": "OBJ-TEST-{{ _.timestamp }}",
    "title": "Test Objective",
    "description": "A test objective for API validation",
    "owner": "objective-owner@example.com",
    "start_date": "2025-01-01",
    "end_date": "2025-12-31",
    "status": "in_progress",
    "business_domain": "Test Domain",
    "metric_ids": ["METRIC-TEST-1", "METRIC-TEST-2"],
    "key_results": [
      {
        "kr_id": "KR-TEST-1-{{ _.timestamp }}",
        "description": "Achieve 95% success rate",
        "target_value": 95,
        "current_value": 85,
        "unit": "percentage",
        "metric_id": "METRIC-TEST-1",
        "status": "on_track"
      },
      {
        "kr_id": "KR-TEST-2-{{ _.timestamp }}",
        "description": "Reduce latency to under 100ms",
        "target_value": 100,
        "current_value": 150,
        "unit": "milliseconds",
        "metric_id": "METRIC-TEST-2",
        "status": "at_risk"
      }
    ]
  },
  "isUpdate": false
}

resources.description: Create or update an objective with key results in PostgreSQL

resources.name: Delete Objective from PostgreSQL
resources.description: Delete an objective and its key results from PostgreSQL (CASCADE)
